channel.title: Static Ip
channel.description: Every time I create a static IP I get disconnected and get limited connectivity. I called my ISP and they said they only give static IP addresses to businesses? Is this true or what, If not how can I create a static IP without losing my internet connection?

item.title: Static Ip
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED

Every time I create a static IP I get disconnected and get limited connectivity. I called my ISP and they said they only give static IP addresses to businesses? Is this true or what, If not how can I create a static IP without losing my internet connection?
